title: Code.org CS Ambassador Program - Event Survey

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Thank you for running this event as a Code.org Ambassador!

In order to measure the impact of our program, we need to gather some information about your event. This step is required for your event to be counted towards the Ambassador Program.

elements.name: teacher_account
elements.title: Are you logged in to your teacher account?
elements.description: If you are logged into your teacher account you will see an option to create a section on your dashboard.

choices.text: Yes, I am logged into my teacher account
No, I am logged into my student account

elements.name: student_account
elements.html:
Please sign out and sign back in using your teacher account credentials

Remember that you should sign in using your Code.org teacher account for all activities you do as an ambassador.

elements.name: event_info_header
elements.html:
Event Information

These questions gather information about your event.

elements.name: event_type
elements.title: Was this an Experience CS event or a Connect with CS event?

choices.text: Connect with CS (not in Code Studio)

elements.name: total_participants
elements.title: How many students attended your event?

elements.name: pre_enrollment
elements.title: At the *start* of your event, how many students indicated interest in enrolling in CS next year?

elements.name: post_enrollment
elements.title: At the *end* of your event, how many students indicated interest in enrolling in CS next year?

elements.name: cdo_heart_you
